content: You have entered a circular map. In the following questions, I will tell you what items are on the map, as well as your position and movements. You need to tell me the item you find after your movements. Please provide only the name of the item. Note that your answer should include only the name of the item and no other words.(Notice that for the same ring map, if the clockwise and counterclockwise paths in the route are exchanged, it will be possible to return to the starting point from the endpoint.)

You have been given a circular path consisting of 10 connected dots. At the start, you are positioned on the dot that is located at the top of the path, where you find a soda bottle. Moving in a clockwise direction from the soda bottle, the elements on the path are a Lhasa Apso, a shield, a hare, a Schipperke, a salt shaker, a threshing machine, a Standard Schnauzer, a space bar, and a wing. Starting from the Lhasa Apso, you move around the ring by 1 step in a clockwise direction, and you move around the ring by 5 steps in a clockwise direction, and you move around the ring by 10 steps in a counter-clockwise direction. What will you find?

You have been given a circular path consisting of 10 connected dots. At the start, you are positioned on the dot that is located at the top of the path, where you find a soda bottle. Moving in a clockwise direction from the soda bottle, the elements on the path are a Lhasa Apso, a shield, a hare, a Schipperke, a salt shaker, a threshing machine, a Standard Schnauzer, a space bar, and a wing. Starting from the Standard Schnauzer, you move around the ring by 1 step in a counter-clockwise direction, and you move around the ring by 5 steps in a counter-clockwise direction, and you move around the ring by 10 steps in a clockwise direction. What will you find?
